context: Spotify Technology S.A. is a audio streaming platform focused on music streaming, podcasts, and audiobooks. Joe Rogan exclusive. Podcast platform expansion.

competitors.name: Apple Music
competitors.notes: Second largest streaming provider, 90M song library, no free tier

competitors.name: Amazon Music
competitors.notes: 55M+ global users, 8.2% market share, integrated with Alexa

competitors.name: YouTube Music
competitors.notes: Replaced Google Play Music, video integration

competitors.name: Pandora
competitors.notes: US-focused, launched Pandora Premium with Rdio technology
